website_summaries.verdict: While these headphones can be uncomfortable if you wear glasses, they provide exceptional sound with clear highs and lows.
pros: As lightweight as these are, they block out significant background noise even though they aren't noise-canceling and last hours on a single charge
cons: There are no EQ options offered, and the mic doesn't pick up loudly enough

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY. YOU WILL BE SORRY!! The plastic band on top cracks with extremely gentle use
customer_reviews.text: Sound and battery life were good, but there are 2 cracks going all of the way through the plastic headband. Update: it's officially fallen apart apart and cracked all the way through after nine weeks of gentle usage. I never stretched them past the point of the width of my head. If somebody said something to me I slid them forward instead of pulling them outwards to be able to listen. Very very disappointed. Will never purchase a product from this company again
customer_reviews.author: R H

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Beats!
customer_reviews.text: This set of headphones have become my main set of headphones. I didn't think I would find anything to outdo my Dre's Beats headphones but these did. Everything range is clear in this set: highs, lows, and mid ranges. I listen to a wide range of music styles - from classical to rap and it all sounds good in this set. The only bad thing I can say about this set is that the sound is not so well insulated. If I'm listening to music in bed next to my wife as she sleeps, the sound is loud enough outside of the set to disturb her.
customer_reviews.author: K. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Just Got Mine, Like it So Far
customer_reviews.text: I bought mine based on the reviews. Headphone sound quality is very subjective. I like bass but I don't like when headphones muddy the rest of the sound and these don't seem to do that. The build quality feels better than some reviews let on. One word of advice, I had a hard time pairing these with my phone. It wouldn't show up when scanning for Bluetooth devices. You need to turn the headphones on, then press Volume Up and Down at the same time to clear the last pairing from memory (which was done in the factory to test the headphones). After that they worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: M. C. Haney

customer_reviews.title: Don't be fooled.
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like these but Taotronics offered to replace them with their BH-21’s which are better but unfortunately don’t swivel flat. It seems like no company wants to make a headset that sounds good, has aptX and swivels flat. Anyway the BH-21’s are definitely better than the BH-20’s from a sound quality point of view so if you don’t need them to swivel I’d recommend skipping the BH-20 and going straight for the 21’s.
customer_reviews.author: Dante Recknagel

customer_reviews.title: Cracking along head band
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these headphones and within less than six months have issues with the plastic of the headband cracking. As soon as I tape one crack, another crack further up appears. These headphones are not even transported. They are kept in my desk at work so the plastic is brittle enough to crack with virtually no force being placed on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Distortion. Much better options out there.
customer_reviews.text: I thought I'd take a chance with these with all the positive reviews and for the price, I figured why not? The battery life, fit, and quality of these headphones are all excellent but none of that makes any difference once you hear them. The sound is horrible: a lot of distortion at regular listening levels and with a full charge. Pretty disappointed. I'm not taking a chance with a replacement and returning this pair. If you're looking for something in the same price range that sound better, consider any Jlab Bluetooth headphones. But if course, for the best quality, you'll have to spend a lot more.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: It would have been nice if the left side worked
customer_reviews.text: It would have been nice if the left side worked. The right side, which actually works, but sound muddled. I'm no audiophile, but the quality is pretty bad. I guess you get what you pay for - do yourself a favor and save your money.
customer_reviews.author: O. Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great Cheap Headphones and bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: Over all the headset works great. Talking on the phone the other person can hear you speak and you can hear great. Bluetooth set up is easy and sound of music is great. The area that extends and moves the individual head set is not durable at all. The first time I pulled down the headset head phones to fit, and put over my ears, the plastic piece on the hinge broke off making it now lose and uslightly. So if you do not mind cheap plastic, this is for you. I have since got durable headsets.
customer_reviews.author: William J. Hathaway

customer_reviews.title: Long battery life, great sound, easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried about purchasing these just because I’m so conditioned to seen prices of other wireless headset been 3 to 4 times the amount of this cost. I am very happy that I ended up purchasing these because they’re a very high-quality headset that I would recommend to anyone that needs something to use around the house. I’ve use these while mowing the yard and also any other little tasks around my house to listen to football games, and sports radio. As far as the sound quality for listening to actual music, definitely has great bass and the overall sound quality is fantastic! Highly recommend these to anyone A+
customer_reviews.author: S. Bassler

customer_reviews.title: Too small for ears :(
customer_reviews.text: Short and sweet: Very good choice, if you don't have a big head. My head and ears aren't particularly big but over a few hours usage these just left my ears hurting from pressure. That said, the Bluetooth is extremely reliable. The sound was extremely good, clear, loud and crisp. Control are responsive. They were fairly comfortable despite the pressure. Battery life was fantastic. Mic was fairly reliable. Being able to fall back onto aux was great. Most importantly, people around me couldn't hear the audio. Customer was very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: AR

customer_reviews.title: Audio quality is great, controls are easy, battiers last
customer_reviews.text: Very impressive audio quality, I use these in conjunction with my Oculus Rift for a truly immersive VR experience. Aside from that, I'll use these if I want to listen to music late at night when my family is asleep. The controls are easy and intuitive, I'll buy another pair in the future, should the need arise. Range is steady until about 20 feet against my PC's USB adapter. It's about 30 feet from my laptop or tablet. Batteries charge quickly and last seemingly for around 30 hours of regular use.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Haskell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent set of headphones with a strong built-in mic
customer_reviews.text: I've had these headphones for a few months now, and they have proven to be wonderful. Solid sound quality (not audiophile level, but good enough), reasonably good blocking of external noise in office environments, and a surprisingly strong built-in microphone. I've been told the call quality via these headphones sounds better than my dedicated bluetooth headsets. Excellent battery life as well. Overall a solid set of headphones for both audio and teleconferencing needs.
customer_reviews.author: Jh

customer_reviews.title: TaoTronics creates a Bluetooth Headset
customer_reviews.text: My way of doing is open the box and charge it. So I did. The packaging was creative and wonderful. A charge in a couple of hours made it so they can play a whole day--24 hours! The on-off, pairing, louder and softer are right on the headset. Can answer a phone because of the built-in mic, and can play back music that sounds beautiful. We stream a lot so we can be private with them. Charge it and then Bluetooth it or use the cable. Can even pair two phones! Could have had the headphones fold towards the over-the-headring, but it is ok; the headphones lay flat so they can pack well to travel with.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Naber

customer_reviews.title: Not for people with bigger heads, but great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: I’ve added another star for their great customer service! They responded to my review and offered a replacement or refund. Since we had already purchased a different set, they promptly issued a refund! Will definitely consider other products by this company when the need arises. ORIGINAL REVIEW: The headphones worked great for my boyfriend, whose hearing is less than perfect! He said they were comfortable and provided great sound quality, and blocked outside noise well. The problem was the construction. He has a bigger head, and the headband on these snapped within a month. It’s a shame, because they worked really well.
customer_reviews.author: VBHokie82

customer_reviews.title: Good for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I got these headphones during a sale for $20. The sound quality is not bad for the price, the sound is bass heavy. Pretty light and the battery life is amazing. I've gotten the 25 hour battery life as advertised in a single charge. The design is on-ear and the ear cups are soft and maintain their shape. Because of the on ear design, after long usage, it can be uncomfortable. The one problem I have is one of the battery in one of the ear cup broken from the magnetic housing and now is loose inside the ear cup. This happened a week after I got my product and I keep it pretty safe in my backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: They don't hold up over time
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty happy to begin with. They had good sound, they didn't hurt, and the battery lasted well. The bluetooth snaps and crackles if you get more than 5 ft from device, but for the cost I just carried my phone with me. But they are already cracking apart where they fold. I have duct tape on them but they don't work as well now either. I got them in October so I would expect them to last longer. Update- the company contacted me and gave me a replacement pair of headphones. So far so good with this pair. Sunvalley did make it right with me. Very pleased so I raised my rating to 4.
customer_reviews.author: slicks girl

customer_reviews.title: Product begins to die after 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the same brand transmitter. Worked fine for 2 weeks, but has gradually started to die. After 2 weeks, it took up to 3 minutes to turn on and grab a signal. Now it is between 10 - - - 15 minutes, sometimes longer. Very unhappy with this product and would prefer to return but it has been over a month. Don’t buy it’!!! It’s a piece of crap.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Worked great until it broke.
customer_reviews.text: Update: the headband has now cracked in half... had to throw them out. Originally I would have said this was a fantastic product for the price. I’ve only had it a few months and the whole right side snapped off. I only use these once every few weeks, and I don’t leave them laying around. The plastic assembly is extremely thin.
customer_reviews.author: Scott D. Chandler

customer_reviews.title: These headphones work really good. The quality of them is very good
customer_reviews.text: These headphones work really good. The quality of them is very good. Easy to pair and use. I have paired them with two samsung devices so far. The sound quality is good for the price. Not excellent but pretty good. Reason for only 4 stars is they kind of sit funny on your head. The band sticks out far around the sides of your head and the top pad isnt the most comfortable. The cups feel fine on the ears though. I would recommend these though and I also have the same company's sport bluetooth earbuds which work well.
customer_reviews.author: Brian J. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Sound quality is really good for a variety of music, particularly the bass and vocals. No crackly aspect to the sound because of Bluetooth either, or because of loudness. The headphones were a little tight around my ears,but otherwise quite comfortable. They also do a good job of blocking out external sound. The other thing I liked is that it charges super quickly – I charged it for 20 minutes and it’s already been playing for more than an hour and a half. I was expecting my phone to be drained, but surprisingly the Bluetooth feature barely hit my battery. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tayra

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bass, great price point, but durability is questionable.
customer_reviews.text: I got mine on daily deal. I didn't expect the bass is that good. Try listen to music like "Bebe Rexha - Meant to Be", and you will witness your headphone rattles. In addition, watching movie is also excellent if not great! Minus 1 star for durability. It feels fragile, so do handle it with care. I do not know how long this will last. I have had mine for less than a week.
customer_reviews.author: loudheart

customer_reviews.title: Careful in Handling, otherwise Decent Product
customer_reviews.text: Earpiece hinge broke or came loose after removing from plastic packaging. Did not realize until it would not stay in place on ear. Quality was great while it lasted. I've owned other TaoTronics products with mixed reviews. some hit, some miss. In terms of aesthetics, it looks sleek, feels qualitative but with regret because it seemingly was less than perfect out the box, I don't think I would repurchase. Good feel on the ear. Perhaps I just got a dud, not sure.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus A. Gunn

customer_reviews.title: Saved by TaoTronics and Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 5 different sets of headphones and every one of them broke all returned and completely refunded by Amazon. Thank you. Finally I found these headphones on amazon and remembered the company name of TaoTronics. I have multiple items from this company and I am completely satisfied with all of them. Now, add one more item. From now on I am going right to TaoTronics products. Quality and long lasting. No questions. Thanks TaoTronics.
customer_reviews.author: Mike L

customer_reviews.title: Pairs with Fire Tablets
customer_reviews.text: As a 78 year old retiree, this is my first experience with any Bluetooth product, and I found it quite easy to pair with the Fire 10 tablet which, in my estimation, produces a somewhat tinny sound. The on ear head phones produce quality sound without disturbing others in the room, and the ear buds turn flat in such a way that they can be stored and carried in a briefcase along with the tablet, an obvious advantage while waiting in a medical office for others to complete their appointments. I have no need for a microphone and have not used this feature.
customer_reviews.author: BERNARD F. CROWLEY

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely more than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Nice- a lot lighter than anticipated for over the ear-so was apprehensive until I turned on. WOW. Happy camper. Sound quality to my ears is exceptional- very clear highs & lows not all muddled together. Paired with TT- BA08 Bluetooth trans/reciever. Comfortable-light-sound is great.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Poor Material, do not pay 40 bucks for these
customer_reviews.text: The sound is great, the battery life is awesome. Problem? They will start to crack within a week, it's like the top is made of eggshells. Plus side with a warranty they will send you another pair for free...That will break. Pass on these, not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: ebby0110

customer_reviews.title: Good sound for the price.
customer_reviews.text: So far I like the product. Can’t say much about durability since I haven’t had it for long. Sound quality is pretty good for the price point. Sustained bass does distort a bit, which is the biggest let down if you want to call it that. Really great for listening to music while mowing or other outdoor activities. If the noise cancelling version drops down in price I will be buying that one as well.
customer_reviews.author: R. C. Nziramasanga

customer_reviews.title: Short in left ear piece wiring or metal band causes unit to turn OFF
customer_reviews.text: Update : Selling company contacted me and sent a brand new headset in 2 days. Very easy process done via email. New headphones arrived and I’ve been using them for a day now. They are AWESOME!! Very comfortable and sound is amazing !! Lots of great reviews here so not sure what happened. Unit was fully charged and as soon as I extended the left ear piece downward the unit turns off. The may be a short in wiring or a defect in the metal band that folds the left arm inward for packing. Either way, unit won’t turn back on.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones for the money
customer_reviews.text: Tao tronics makes pretty decent products and this pair of headphones is no exception. Headphones are light weight and the battery life is awesome. They are a little bass heavy so depending on your music preference this is either good or bad. Also tao tronics actually stands behind their products, i had problems with another item of theirs and the communication and resolution were both top notch.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Value Purchase - high quality
customer_reviews.text: I have owned many products from TaoTronics. I was in the market for a better headphone for a long trip ( 7-12 hours fly) but did not want shell out more than $100. I was searching and reading many other brands before settled for TaoTronics TT-BH20. I am not disappointed at warm clear sound reproduced: nice bass, clear mid and high. I have tested battery life and it lived up 25+ hours music listening. For this price point, it is a value purchase that does not compromises quality.
customer_reviews.author: joehong2002

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used these a whole lot, so I can't speak much to durability or battery life. The sound quality on these was better than any other Bluetooth headphones I've ever used. I haven't tried any over $50 but I've tried a lot in this price range and these blow them all out of the water. Foam padding was pretty comfortable on my giant head.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful headphones. I have owned multiple TaoTronics products and have loved everyone of them, so when I saw that these were only $10 a few months ago and had no reviews I decided I'd give them a try because I've had such great luck with this brand in the past. Definitely not a mistake. I love these! The sound quality is fantastic and they're surprisingly durable for being an all plastic construction. Would definitely recommend. The only con is they hug the ears pretty tight after awhile and make them somewhat sore.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This headset fits comfortable (it's an over-the-ear set) and is adjustable to fit also bigger heads. The pairing with a Galaxy S8 worked fine, the controls on the right side of the headset are intuitiv. Sound quality is good as well, considering the price. The same goes for the build quality. It is not a $300 high end headset, but an excellent value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Roger K.

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for computer audio. Headband broke in November. It hangs by wires and is completely useless. I am unable to contact vendor. So if you want to throw your money away, i would highly recommend buying these or any other product from this vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and looks elegant.
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! Perfect for what I needed. Im on a 24 hour flight soon and wanted something thats lightweight, comfy that can travel and fold up. Its like wearing,.. oh i dunno. A cloud. So super lightweight and comfortable. Others I looked at looked too bulky and looked weird on your head. These look great! Havent tested battery life yet. Sound is great too. Not for audiophiles or dj'ing obvs but for the price, totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Krizza.f

customer_reviews.title: Sound Quality/Battery Life
customer_reviews.text: My TaoTronics Headphones is always hanging in the kitchen and I utilized while cooking/eating, which is spent at least three (3) hours a day or more. These Headphones never let me down regarding SOUND/BATTERY LIFE. It will last for about one week until it has to be charged again. I have had my Headphones for seven (7) months and it is UNBELIEVABLE... FYI, the picture with Headphones and in the background our miniature Christmass Tree is up the whole year because EVERYDAY we treat ourselves to a present. Can you guess what was one of our presents? Yes, you are correct, TaoTronics Wireless Headphones...
customer_reviews.author: GILBERT A KIAHA

customer_reviews.title: solid battery life and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is solid, the sound quality is good, and the ear cups are comfortable on my head for all day usage at work. I love that I still have the option to use with 3.5mm jack which from what I can tell doesn't take any battery power another plus. this is my favorite "off brand" brand I have a pair of their bluetooth earbuds as well and those are good as well. Sorta wish the 3.5mm cord included was a little longer but its not enough of an issue that Id take a star off.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality. I gave it 4 stars because at halfway volume on my phone, the headphones could be used as a portable speaker and I get paranoid I'm disturbing persons next to me. Otherwise it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Appiness

customer_reviews.title: Updated review. They provided a refund and a replacement
customer_reviews.text: Updated review. They gave me a refund and sent me a replacement. It was unopened and worked great out of the box. I love having both Bluetooth and the ability to use a cord when desired. The headphones are comfortable and the battery last a long time. Original review:Doa, and the package i received had already been opened The multi function button would not press so I couldn't even turn them on
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: and boy what a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two of these by mistake, and boy what a waste of money. They won't charge so I can't say much about the Bluetooth, and if you try to use the 35mm it will only play mono. Great. A waste of $60 and if I want to return them I have to pay for the return shipping.
customer_reviews.author: VRoc

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: First set had some intermittent cutout via bluetooth on my iPod Touch and Android S8. Spoke to customer service / vendor and after some troubleshooting, they shipped me a new set. So far so good with second pair. Very Happy with the great customer support.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Robinson

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are OK at best. You get what you pay for. Pros: - The sound is good. - They are cheap. - Pairing is easy. - Can be used wired if so desired. Cons: - The padding on the phone is very thin. - They squeeze your head, they hurt my ears after less than an hour. This may change after use but right now it's hard to put up with. Wouldn't suggest using glasses with these. - The sound will bleed out even at low volumes.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Peterson

customer_reviews.title: For the price, it's a great all-around product.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter practically lives in these things. She had one set and they lasted about 6 months (her average for most headphones or earbuds is 3-6 months). She loved them so much, we bought them again. For the price, it's a great product all around. Nothing is particularly outstanding about them, they're good in general.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Bluetooth Headphones
customer_reviews.text: For the price they pump out decent sound and the battery lasts for multiple work days. Bluetooth is easy to set up and I haven't had issues with connectivity. Only minor issue is the break in period. They squeezed my ears enough to make them sore by day's end. However after a couple of weeks either I got used to them or they loosened up enough to be comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Albert F.

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of TaoTronics and they definitely delivered. I was just looking for something with decent quality that I could wear to the gym and I’m loving these head phones so far.
customer_reviews.author: danielle

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great, blocks out all backround noise. You just enjoy your music or vidio. Very comfortable to weare. I wouldent yse them for joging or any thing like that though, they block out most other sound are a bit too bulky for that.
customer_reviews.author: Florida man

customer_reviews.title: Sound is decent, not great
customer_reviews.text: I am editing my review of these, having first given a so-so review based on performance that I suspect may have been compromised by programs running on my laptop. With those disabled, the clarity/quality is awesome; and I do not mean at this price-point, but awesome period.
customer_reviews.author: CCCYakima

customer_reviews.title: Fine ‘Phones at a Fair Price
customer_reviews.text: These Bluetooth phones sound really good, are super comfortable, and have a battery that lasts a very long time between charges. I used them primarily to listen to TV sound — dialog was clear and there was no time lag. After five weeks, the headband broke and just one email to the company solved the problem; the customer response was excellent, and a short time later a brand-new set of headphones was delivered to me. These headphones can’t be beat for the money, and you won’t find better customer support.
customer_reviews.author: Vic from Bayside

customer_reviews.title: Promising but... not durable
customer_reviews.text: I order these headphones for my son because of the reasonable price and the fact they were bluetooth. I was cautiously optimistic, especially when unpacking them. Everything seemed good quality. Set up was easy, although we needed to reboot his android phone to get it to connect. All seemed good but after 2 days they cracked along the headband. He's pretty responsible with his electronics, so I checked other reviews and this seems to be a common issue. UPDATE: Customer service is great. They eagerly reached out to insure that the I was pleased with the resolution. Replacement headphones have been great. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair. I love the foam feel of the ears and the fit is great and adjustable. The problem is both pairs I’ve owned now have broken where you can adjust them. I used black wire tape to try to keep them together because otherwise I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy King

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones for the price
customer_reviews.text: Best headphones for the price. All three of my kids have these and they are perfect for their I Phones. Because of the price point I’m not worried about the breaking them or leaving them somewhere but so far they’ve held up amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Received defective piece!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: I got the replacement delivered today. I just tested it. The sound is amazing. I can totally immerse myself into music forgetting the outside world. Even with good volume, it doesn't disturb the person sitting next to me. As I already mentioned below, I liked the fit and the look. Excellent customer service and best value for money. First time in Amazon, I am receiving a defective product. Left side not working. Bluetooth is not working as well. I couldn't pair it with my mac as well my android phone but it just keeps flashing blue. When I tested wired mode, music plays only on the right side. I liked the fit and style though. Returning it!
customer_reviews.author: Ganeshbabu

customer_reviews.title: saves my marriage
customer_reviews.text: These work great. Good sound though not Bose. The Bluetooth connection works well and pairs easy with either my LG TV or computer. Comfortable which is important for me. Now I can watch my movies after wife goes to bed!
customer_reviews.author: john206

customer_reviews.title: Great headset
customer_reviews.text: This headset needs to be charged prior to use. Once charged the unit powers on. When pairing you need to make sure red and blue cycle in order to pair to your phone. Once paired the quality is real nice compared to other headsets and is pretty good value for the price
customer_reviews.author: PS

customer_reviews.title: Good... but...
customer_reviews.text: I'd give it a five star but the aux cord that came with the headphones did not properly work. The sound is great and the battery life so far hasn't been an issue. They're soft on the ears and cancel out most noise when listening to music or watching a movie. The only bad thing as I mentioned is that lack of functionality of the aux cord.
customer_reviews.author: Guillermo Carranza

customer_reviews.title: didn't fit comfortably. they were too wide and didn't extend far ...
customer_reviews.text: didn't fit comfortably.they were too wide and didn't extend far enough down to not place too much pressure on the top of my head while reaching my ears. seems they were designed for a round-headed person
customer_reviews.author: L. Briscoe

customer_reviews.title: Updated...
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE!!! I was sent a replacement for the pair that didn’t work and they are working flawlessly. Bluetooth connection is quite simple and sound quality is WAY better than my son’s $100 earphones and louder. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: CBMet

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! At first I wasn't having trouble powering off ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! At first I wasn't having trouble powering off and on but I realized it was my fault how I was pressing the buttons lol but I figured it out. Battery life is amazing. The ONLY issue I have is if i keep them on longer then an hour they hurt my ears. I think it's because I have a big head lol. AMAZING nonetheless. Highly recommend purchasing whenever they come back in stock.
customer_reviews.author: KyKy20

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality, a equalizer would be good for different kind of music. Connects well with mi laptop and mobile, no issues at all. Could be better with a integrated equalizer but at this price it does the job. They feels comfortable when put them on.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie M.

customer_reviews.title: Headset and TV transmitter
customer_reviews.text: The instructions for pairing the transmitter to the headset were easy to follow. I ordered this for my husband that has hearing loss and it has made my TV watching very pleasant. I no longer have to listen to the audio so loud!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound quality
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent headphones for the money! They come in a nice package, are easy to pair to my devices, and my kids love to use them with no wires! I had to rip them from their small hands just to get a listen to them! In the short time I've listened to them, they have excellent sound quality and nice bass. I almost can't tell the difference between them and my $200 "high end" headphones. Don't wait, buy these!
customer_reviews.author: ScottC

customer_reviews.title: No other headset can compare! Great item!
customer_reviews.text: Really great headset for the price! I was very surprised that it was shipped on a Sunday, it was my first time getting a package on a Sunday which is better service than what I expected, the headset also comes with a male to male 3.5 mm audio jack in case you wanted a wired setup. Great item, I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Killasurg89

customer_reviews.title: repeat
customer_reviews.text: I loved mine that I bought last year I bought these for discerning grandson who approved!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Only issue I have is my daughter stealing them on me. Doesn't come with instructions to bluetooth but all you need is to hold on the power button past when it says power one and wait until it says bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Received Bluetooth headphones in New condition. These headphones sound really good. The Bluetooth range good. I did have a little trouble figuring out how to turn them on and connect the Bluetooth, once I figured it out I was off to the races and enjoying the great sound. I would recommend these to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: TY

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality is pretty good. Press the button until you see the ...
customer_reviews.text: It works well. I can use it by Bluetooth and also can use it by the connected line insert to the device. The sound quality is pretty good. Press the button until you see the red and blue flashing. In this way you can connect the Bluetooth quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Yu

customer_reviews.title: More than worth it if you're not rough with it.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality thus far. Surprisingly excellent battery life in Bluetooth, and apparently capable of running uncharged via audio jack. A great buy for the price. It's only downfall it's how delicate it is - be excessive in careful handling, otherwise the folding joint will break.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas

customer_reviews.title: Better than "kids" headphones
customer_reviews.text: Made the mistake of getting "kids" headphones before only to have them fail after 3 months. These were only a few $ more and are vastly superior. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Brent J.

customer_reviews.title: Very Poor Durability
customer_reviews.text: Have owned this product for 1 month. Used carefully by adult user. Just by placing on head each side broke at different times. Other than the folding joints, this product works well. If you purchase buy the warranty. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT. I purchased a Square Trade Warranty and claim was rejected because item broke. Total misrepresentation of warranty as device broke due to a mechanical issue.
customer_reviews.author: dennis

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of headphones for the money.
customer_reviews.text: These are light weight and the earphone cushions are soft. I only wish they were a little larger cup size. Other than that, for the money, you can't beat it👍
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headset with great sound/reception quality.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent headset with great sound/reception quality. I really like the extra bass effect this headset produces when listening to the songs. I have been using it for a week now and still did not charge the headsets. The battery life is amazing!! The item is packaged well and came with an aux cable as well if the battery runs out. Also these headsets can be used with the phone, which I need to try and see how it works. Once nice feature I noticed is I could pair this headset with my iPhone and iPad simultaneously.
customer_reviews.author: Rahul K.

customer_reviews.title: Needs a little more padding
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping the ear padding would be a little better quality as there does not seem to be very much of it compared with similar headphones. Sound quality is great so far but I'll need to test it with some greater frequency ranges. Bass is definitely there though.
customer_reviews.author: AMartinez86

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Well made Durable Light Great sound very loud with the perfect bass treble Battery is great Unbelievably low priced I would think more like $99 Awesome buy
customer_reviews.author: John P. Forte

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones for the money.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones can't compete with Sony or Bose or any other high-end headphones costing $200 or more. But if you want a decent sound you can't beat the low pricing Taotronics offers.
customer_reviews.author: TLM

customer_reviews.title: You can't just throw them around or mistreat them, if you sit on them they will break.
customer_reviews.text: Used it for the gym and home listening to music around the house, used it to block out my wife yelling and used it to block out my kids screaming and yelling while they are gaming, oh, and both of my kids use their TaoTronics while they are gaming.
customer_reviews.author: JDS

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this unit for work. Only used it a few weeks (7 weeks) and the right speaker went out. I dont have bluetooth on my PC so i was using the head phone cable it comes with. I tried a different cable but that didnt work either, only the left ear speaker would work. I had tried to contact the seller about 3 weeks ago, but have not received any communications back. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: David H

customer_reviews.title: Can save a marriage
customer_reviews.text: Got these to go with a bluetooth transmitter for the TV. I have saved my parent's marriage. Dad needs a hearing aid and won't get one. Mom turns down the TV + Dad turns it up = WW3.
customer_reviews.author: C. Locheiven

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of the sound quality because of the price and the material feels a little cheap but these sound about as good as my sony monitor headphone. Great bang for buck, love that they have the option to connect an aux cord incase you run out of battery. These might not impress an audiophile but for the majority of people they are great.
customer_reviews.author: R. Armendariz

customer_reviews.title: Not a lot of high frequency response, but OK for price
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for teleconference use with my iMac, and they work fine - but there is a clear absent of highs. I also use them when moving the lawn, and while they're not noise canceling, they work OK for that, too.
customer_reviews.author: Medical Marketing Maven

customer_reviews.title: Good inexpensive option
customer_reviews.text: Although I have tended to prefer wired headphones, I've recently given a few Bluetooth options a try. These seem to be good quality for the price. They are about as comfortable as any other budget on ear headphones in my experience. Battery life is good as well. I am concerned about long-term durability since inexpensive headphones can break easily, but I will update this review if necessary. At this point, I definitely recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The number of five star reviews on this is baffling ...
customer_reviews.text: The number of five star reviews on this is baffling. The sound quality awful. Everything sounds muffled and airy, and there's a constant faint hiss.
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones specifically to listen to talk radio and for that they are extremely good, you can hear a pin drop in the studio,the battery life is exceptional, amazing amount of time, as far as music goes the sound is not as full and rich as I would like but still very good.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Recommended  good
customer_reviews.text: As described. Came as promised. This was my first blue tooth wireless headset and I am very pleased. Comfortable to use. On ear headphones. Batteries lasted 20 hours approximately low to medium volume. 2-3 hours to fully charge
customer_reviews.author: M S

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but average sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality product, but average sound quality. no deep bass..but overall I am happy
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Not very comfortable with eyeglasses
customer_reviews.text: The volume on the lowest is a little too loud still and when I wear them with my glasses they press too much because they're too tight -update: the seller sent me a new pair of a different style for free and they fit and function great.
customer_reviews.author: Ggrag

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Very Happy I choose this headset. My Boyfriend is going to love it. I had to take them out of the package to test them. They sound amazing and the fact that you can use them as Bluetooth or with an aux cord is awesome. I'll be getting myself a pair =D
customer_reviews.author: Hay

customer_reviews.title: Pairing Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.text: Can not get the headphones to pair up with any phones. Tried several times. Follow-up. They replaced the head phones and it worked great. They paired right up no problems. Customer service did a great job making sure I was satisfied with my set.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie S.

customer_reviews.title: Setup instructions are not clear
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to set per instructions. Once I got tech support on the phone I was able to get it to function.
customer_reviews.author: P J  Walcik

customer_reviews.title: For inexpensive headphones, they do not feel cheap!
customer_reviews.text: I have had these headphones for just a couple weeks, but I really like them! They're sturdy, but comfortable (I've even slept with them on). They charge quickly, and the battery lasts for days. My only complaint is they have more bass than I like. However, I am not going to let that bother me... I definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sweet deal for under $40
customer_reviews.text: Im all about function over form (over ear doesnt bother me) and i like the way over ear headsets drown out background noise. Range is pretty good, left it on the kitchen table and got upstairs before sound degraded. Overall great buy for the money, mic is crystal clear on phone calls. Had a little trouble setting it up, but was able to get in touch with customer support and got it linked to my samsung note 5 in lwss than 5 minutes. (Make sure its blinking red and blue when pairing, not just blue).
customer_reviews.author: Chris A

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful then Not
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoyed these while they lasted. Last night was sitting listen to a show through the headphones and I heard this large pop noise and the headphones fell off my head.
customer_reviews.author: Yes Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: So good they can’t hear me. Each son has a set, and this was a replacement order after one pair was stepped on and broken. Great shipping speed and easy to pair.
customer_reviews.author: Cwills

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is a plus but the sound is too brassy for me however I will keep them.They look nice and stay on my head when I am exercising.
customer_reviews.author: jack

customer_reviews.title: Do not have to hear somebody else’s music
customer_reviews.text: Used him with my wife’s galaxy phone she listen to her music while we’re driving while I was in the mine
customer_reviews.author: billy hickman

customer_reviews.title: Do It Yourself TV Ears
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to team up with a TT bluetooth transmitter connected to our TV. They have good sound and are lighter than my Sennheiser wireless earphones. Pairing was easy and they have remained connected for a week with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Richard T. Stagner

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: Lasted about 8 months before cracking. As you can see from the picture, the plastic that the screws attach to broke off. I take decent care of the items I purchase, and these headphones were not abused in any way. Just through the simple act of placing them on my head and taking them off caused the plastic to break. I get it, these are cheap for a reason. But I was hoping to get at least a year out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Judge Dredd 380

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones
customer_reviews.text: So I got these for my 12 year old son. At first we couldn't figure out how to set up but once we did my son says that the sound quality is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: alicia

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality, but not greatly made.
customer_reviews.text: Overall my husband loves these headphones. Great for workout, riding the bus, reading in the break room. Sounds quality is excellent and there is a mic to even talk on the phone. Unfortunately while my husband was lifting weights today the top plastic part cracked. He has only had them since January. Now they are a bit loose on his head and can't get tighten. Would like a replacement if possible. It does come with a warranty. Hoping they are covered under warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Katheryn Q

customer_reviews.title: Impressed by their customer service
customer_reviews.text: Bought to be able to listen to TV with volume down...works fine as long as your TV has Bluetooth or you add a transmitter. First headphones didn't work properly. Called the number for the seller and they were very helpful. I ended up replacing original ones and have been pleased with the sound and performance of the replacement pair. Had these for about 2 months now and they work fine.
customer_reviews.author: David S

customer_reviews.title: I broke it within.one day
customer_reviews.text: The problem with this type of headphone from China is that while the sound quality is great, there is a part of the headphone that is extremely fragile. If you pull on it, it will snap.
customer_reviews.author: Chi

product_meta.title: Bluetooth Headphones, TaoTronics Wireless Headset Over Ear Headphones with Lightweight Memory Foam Ear Pads & Dual 40mm Drivers (3.5mm AUX, On Ear Controls, EQ Bass, 15 Hour Audio Playback)
product_meta.description:
Color:New Black

Sublime Featherlike Comfort
Experience freedom. Made of the lightest, yet durable materials, the TaoTronics Wireless Headset weighs barely 7.58 oz / 215 g for an imperceptible wear that won’t anchor you down. The retractable headband and pillowy, soft memory foam ear pads make for some customizable over ear headphones that stay comfortable for longer.

Dual 40mm Driver Setup
Low frequencies play an indispensable role in making sound feel deeper and simply more immersive. The TaoTronics Bluetooth Earphones sport dual 40mm drivers and an EQ bass setting to bring your music or action movies to life with unbeatable Hi-Fi audio quality.

Wired or Wireless Audio Playback
Why not get the best of both worlds? The TaoTronics Headphones feature both wired and wireless audio reproduction. When the battery depletes after 15 hours of playtime, simply connect the included 3.5mm cable for unlimited wired music.

Collapsible Build with Buttons
Designed to meet the users’ needs to a further extent, the TaoTronics Dual Wired & Wireless Headphones pack a few tricks up their sleeve. In addition to on-ear buttons to control music and volume and a built-in microphone for hands-free calls, the headset is collapsible as to occupy minimum room when travelling.

What’s in the Box:
1 x TaoTronics Dual Wireless & Wired Stereo Headphones
1x USB Charging Cable
1x Audio Cable
1x User Guide
feature_bullets: Sublime featherlike comfort: weighs barely 7.58 oz./ 215 g for an imperceptible wear that won't anchor you down; adjustable headband and memory foam pads stay comfortable for Longer
Dual 40mm driver setup: low frequencies enhancing hardware pairs with EQ bass settings for unbeatable hi-fi Audio quality
Wired or wireless Audio playback: enjoy a lengthy 15-hour playback over Bluetooth with just 2 hours of charging or Plug in the 3.5mm cable for unlimited Audio when the battery runs out
On-ear buttons for full control: change the track, play or pause, and adjust the volume without pulling out your smartphone; chat away hands-free with the integrated mic
Highly portable collapsible design: Bluetooth headphones ingeniously fold so you can conveniently store them when not in use or travelling

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars403 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
